1.「よう ジェイコフ。| その若いのが ウワサの新しい弟子かい？: Hey, J... Is that the young one the new|protégé they're talking about?

2.「これは これは ゴードンさん。| 相変わらず お元気そうで なによりですな。|: Well, well, well, Gord... I'm glad to see|you're as healthy as ever... So, what can I|do for you today?

3.「んだぁっ！？| テメーは アニキに聞かれたことにだけ| 答えてりゃあいいんじゃ: What? All you have to do is answer the|questions you're asked!

4.「ハハ…… こりゃ すみません。| ええ。おっしゃる通り こいつが| 新しい弟子: Hahaha... This is... It's... You're right.|This is my new apprentice.<pc> ...

5.「ほらっ。オメーも ゴードンさんに| ごあいさつしねえか！: ... Why don't you go say hello to Mr. Gordon?

6.「ああ いい いい。……で 約束通り| こいつを モンスター勝ち抜きバトルの|: Yeah, okay. ...... So, we're going to put him|in the ring for the battle of the monsters as|promised, right?

7.「はい それはもう！ こいつが 戦って| 借金が チャラになるんなら| 何百回で: Yes, that's it! I'll let him fight you a|hundred times, a thousand times, if that'll|make the debt go away...

8.「あんたも カネにだらしない師匠を| 持っちまって 災難だよなぁ。| ククク……: It's a shame you have a money-grubbing master|like me... Kukkuk... My heart goes out to|you...

9.「モンスター勝ち抜きバトルってーと| ブランドン様のペットたちと 戦うのかよ？|: A battle of monsters against Brandon's pets?|Oh, you poor thing.

10.「……いいだろう。こいつなら| 中年バトルマスターを戦わせるより| 客も 呼べる: ... Okay... This guy's gonna bring in more|customers than a bunch of middle-aged|battlemasters.

11.「せいぜい いい仕事をして 盛り上げてくれよ。| 受け付けは いつも通り クラー: Do your best to keep things interesting. As|usual, I've put Clark in charge of the|reception, so I'll let him...

12.「全国１０００万のコロシアムファンの皆さま| たいへん お待たせしました！| 本: To the 10 million fans of the Colosseum,|we've been waiting a long time! The curtain|has come down on another bloody feast today!

13.「コロシアムの裏名物 モンスター勝ち抜き戦！| 今夜の挑戦者は 若きバトルマスタ: The Colosseum's backstage specialty, a battle|of the monsters! Tonight's challenger is a|young battle master.<pc> 選...

14.<if_woman>「はたして 彼女は 無事に| リングを下りることが できるの: <if_woman>Will she be able to get out of the ring in|one piece? The time of destiny is drawing|nearer by the minute...<else>Will he be able to get out of the ring in one|piece? His fate is drawing nearer by the|minute...<endif>

15.「見事 イエティを倒した| <pc>選手。あと１勝。| あと１勝すれば 勝利の栄: You've defeated the Yeti|<pc> Players. Oh... One more win, and the glory of|victory will be yours!

16.<if_woman>「しかし 立ちはだかるカベは あまりに高い。| ３回戦の相手:
But there's not much that can stand in the|way... In the third round, she's up against|the Yoroi... How will she fight this|
|desperate opponent?But there's not much that can stand in the|way... In the third round, he's up against|the Yoroi... How will he fight this desperate|
|opponent?

18.「なんと！ なんと！ なんと！| 今日のバトルが 始まる前に| 誰が この結果を: Oh, my God! Oh, my God! Oh, no! Before|today's battle began, who would have|predicted this outcome?

19.「私は 今 新たなコロシアムの伝説の誕生に| 立ち会っているのかもしれません。|: I think I may be witnessing the birth of a|new Coliseum legend. Thank you for the|inspiration.<pc> Players!

20.「お～っと！ これは アクシデントだっ！！: Oh, no! This is an accident!

21.「ただいま入った情報では| 控えで用意していた モンスター３体が| オリを破って: I've just received word that three of the|monsters we had in reserve have broken|through their cages and escaped.

22.「まずいぞ！ まずいぞぉ！| <pc>選手 あぶなぁ～～～い！！: This is not good! This is not good!<pc> Players, watch out!

24.「これは いったい どうしたことだ！？| 突如 現れた 仮面の男が ３体の魔物を: What the heck is going on here? A masked man|appeared out of nowhere and defeated the|three demons in an instant!

25.「……と とにかく サプライズ続きの| 本日の モンスター勝ち抜き戦でしたが|: ... Anyway, we've had a lot of surprises in|today's Monster Elimination Round, but I'll|leave you guys to it!

26.「ンフフフフ……。| じつに 見事な 勝ちっぷりでしたねぇ。| 私 あなたのファ: Mm-hmm... That was quite a victory... I've|become a fan of yours...

27.「それにしても あの仮面の男……| どうやら バトルマスターだったようなので|: Anyway, that masked man... It seems he was a|battle master, so we'll call him Masked|Buster for short...

28.「彼は いったい 何者なんでしょうねぇ？| あの後 係員たちが 探したのですが|: Who the hell is he? The attendants looked for|him after that, but couldn't find him|anywhere...

29.「あれほどの実力を持ちながら| 正体を隠し 姿をくらますなんて| よほど 後ろ暗: How can someone so powerful hide his true|identity and then disappear? Is he really|that shady?

30.「ンフフフフ……。| あなたといい 仮面バスターといい| やはり コロシアムは: Mm-hmm... You, Mask Buster... the Coliseum is|exciting...

31.「おお よくやってくれたな！| オメーの活躍は見せてもらってたぜ。| おかげで: Oh, you've done well. I've seen you in|action... Thanks to you, I'm in debt...|Guffaw...

32.「これは 師匠からの ごほうびだ。| ありがたく 受け取るがいいぞ。: This is a gift from my master. I'm grateful|for it.

33.「オメーの はたらきには| これからも期待してるからな。| オレの言うことを よ: I'm counting on you to keep up your good|work. You listen to me.

34.「いきなり モンスター勝ち抜き戦に| 放り込むなんて 相変わらず| 弟子使いが: You're throwing me into a battle of monsters,|and you're still using me as a pupil...

35.「ゲゲッ！ テメーは セインズ……。| 今さら 何しに現れやがった！？: Geez! You're Sainz... What the hell are you|doing here?

36.「あんたが 新しい弟子をとったと聞いて| 様子を見にきたんですよ。| 元弟子とし: I heard you took on a new apprentice, so I|came to check on you... As your former|apprentice, I can't leave you alone...

37.「お前さんが <pc>か。| モンスター勝ち抜き戦 見せてもらったよ。| なかな: You<pc> I don't know. Let's see what the monsters can|do... The plot seems pretty good...

38.「しかし こんな師匠を持っちまって| 苦労するよなぁ……オレなんて| 途中で 投: But it must be hard to have a master like|him... I gave up halfway through...

39.「まあ 何かあったら この不肖の先輩が| 相談にのるからよ。| くじけずに がん: Well, if you ever need help, this unworthy|senior will be there for you... Don't be|discouraged, just hang in there.

40.「……ケッ！ | 師匠不孝モンが 先輩風 吹かせやがって！: ... Damn it! Master, you filthy fool! You're|acting like a senior!

41.「ああ 胸クソ悪い。| 今日はもう 寝ちまうことにするぜ！: Oh, my heart... I think I'm going to sleep|now!

42.「１回戦の相手は あばれこまいぬ。| この残忍かつ 凶暴な魔物を相手に| <pc: In the first round, we'll be facing off|against the Abarekko. Against this brutal and|vicious demon.<pc> How will the players fight?

44.「見事 あばれこまいぬを倒した| <pc>選手。| しかし その苦難は まだまだ: I've just defeated a rampaging komainu|<pc> The players. But the hardships still|continue...

45.<if_woman>「２回戦の相手は イエティ。| この 恐るべき怪物を相手に|: <if_woman>Her second round opponent, Lee... Will her|skills hold up against this fearsome monster?<else>His second round opponent, Lee... Will his|skills hold up against this fearsome monster?<endif>
